values: I decided to make this journal, to write about my intimate expiriences with my boyfriend. We've been dating for a year now...we've had our ups and plenty of downs. I love him with all of my heart and more than every breath I take. I guess you could say this is a journal about my sex life- which is awesome. You are all jealous ;) This is mostly a Private Journal...if you want me take make you a friend, you'll have to let me think about it...this is the most intimate details of my life and my boyfriends. l o v e you<3
